text: The 2017 FIM Women's Motocross World Championship is the 13th Women's Motocross World Championship season. Livia Lancelot goes into the season as defending champion, after taking her second title in 2016. ==2017 Calendar== A 6-round calendar for the 2017 season was announced on 15 October 2016. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" |- !
